topic: How to document edge runtimes using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to document edge runtimes using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Documenting Edge Runtimes with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide covers the process of documenting edge runtimes using FastAPI, a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understanding FastAPI and its support for automatic API documentation
Utilizing OpenAPI v3 specification to document edge runtimes
Setting up FastAPI project with edge runtime considerations
Customizing the generated docstrings and adding additional documentation sections
Testing and deploying the documented FastAPI application

code_examples.code:
# OpenAPI specification for documenting edge runtime endpoints
paths:
  /: 
    get:
      summary: Edge Runtime Main Endpoint
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message: 
                    type: string
                    description: The main message

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for utilizing the latest features of FastAPI and OpenAPI v3.
Ensure your development environment includes necessary dependencies like FastAPI, Uvicorn (for production deployment), and YAML libraries.
caveats: While FastAPI supports automatic documentation, additional effort may be required for thoroughly documenting edge runtime-specific functionality.
Consider using external tools or custom scripts to augment your FastAPI documentation with detailed edge runtime information and best practices.
